imgui.extension.imguizmo.flag

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • imgui.extension.imguizmo.flag.Operation

  • public final class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    Needs view and projection matrices. Matrix parameter is the source matrix (where will be gizmo be drawn) and might be transformed by the function. Return deltaMatrix is optional. Translation is applied in world space.
